# shouldLoop

**Instance Property**

Stores a Boolean indicating whether the playback loops infinitely, until manually stopped or paused.

## Declaration

```swift
var shouldLoop: Bool
```

## Customizing the playback

- **shouldRandomizeStartTime**: Stores a Boolean indicating whether the playback begins from the start of the file, or from a random position.

items.description: Stores a Boolean indicating whether the playback begins from the start of the file, or from a random position.
